item.title: [508] Custom Sprites (RELEASE)
item.dc:creator: @CameronClark CameronClark
item.description:
@CameronClark wrote:

Hey I try this but I get 3 errors i dont know how to fix, can someone please help me?
Also it would help if you included pics in your tutorial so we exactly know where to put things like the ‘cache’ etc…
But if you can help me I would totally Rep+ you.

[code] .\files\Class68_Sub20_Sub10_Sub1.java:1161: package CustomSprites does not exist

    if(CustomSprites.sprites.containsKey(hash)) {

.\files\Class68_Sub20_Sub10_Sub1.java:1162: package CustomSprites does not exist

        anIntArray4615 = CustomSprites.sprites.get(hash);

.\files\client.java:2196: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable CustomSprites
location: class client
CustomSprites loadCustomSprites(var_client);
^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Working Download Links:
Custom Sprites - http://uppit.com/955A26
Dumps - http://uppit.com/J1MFSD[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 05 October 2009, 22:29:20[/size][hr][quote=“koolgordon, post:8, topic:268393”]Could you make a client and realse it?[/quote]
I made one for you guys with editable sprites and models also

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars
